headline: BYD: Impressive Performance And Good Prospects (Rating Upgrade)
summary: BYD Company defied EV sector weakness in 2024 with strong fundamentals & market multiples indicating it's not overvalued.

headline: XPeng: Positive Outlook Backed By Robust Deliveries Growth
summary: XPeng's Q3 2024 results showed a 16.3% increase in vehicle deliveries and positive gross and vehicle margins. Read why I maintain a Buy rating on XPEV stock.

headline: Li Auto Achieves Record Deliveries and Expands Technological Innovations
summary: Li Auto ( (LI) ) has issued an announcement. Li Auto Inc. reported record deliveries of 58,513 vehicles in December 2024, marking a 16.2% increase year-over-year and achieving over 500,000 annual deliveries for the first time. This milestone underscores the company’s rapid growth in the premium auto segment within China. Li Auto continues to enhance its technological offerings, with the introduction of OTA update version 7.0 that integrates advanced NOA capabilities and a unique intelligent reas

headline: 3 EV Stocks That Could Soar in 2025
summary: The S&P 500 soared by about 25% in 2024, but investors decided to pump the brakes on many of their electric-vehicle (EV) investments during the year.  In fact, Lucid (NASDAQ: LCID), Li Auto (NASDAQ: LI) , and Rivian (NASDAQ: RIVN) all have the potential to race higher in 2025.  The news was disheartening for investors, since the company had stated in May 2023 that it had planned on producing more than 10,000 vehicles for the year.

headline: BYD Takes the Global EV Sales Crown From Tesla Again. That’s Not Enough for the Stock, Though.
summary: BYD, China’s largest EV maker, delivered 207,734 all-electric vehicles in December, up about 9% year over year.  Tesla delivered just under 496,000 EVs in the fourth quarter.  Tesla sold 1.79 million, down about 1%.
